Text:
Guys do not download this file for now. Creator of this mod posted this:

Important: the patch is currently re-uploading because I have forgotten to add some files (for Erebor). If you have already installed the initial patch, the re-uploaded patch can be simply installed on top and will add the missing files.

Here's re-uploaded patch, this time without missing files:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7330395/Third_Age_Total_War_3.2_%28patch_only%29_-_REUPLOAD#filelistContainer
